synonyms.synonym: Cytochrome c oxidase subunit VIIa-related protein

protein.specific_function: May be a regulatory subunit of cytochrome c oxidase that mediates the higher level of energy production in target cells by estrogen

reference.reference_text: Watanabe T, Inoue S, Hiroi H, Orimo A, Kawashima H, Muramatsu M: Isolation of estrogen-responsive genes with a CpG island library. Mol Cell Biol. 1998 Jan;18(1):442-9.
Schmidt TR, Goodman M, Grossman LI: Molecular evolution of the COX7A gene family in primates. Mol Biol Evol. 1999 May;16(5):619-26.
